content: honeycomb headband this quick and satisfying project looks so much more complicated than it really is if you can knit and purl you can make this no fancy color work required each round is worked in a single color while your second color waits at the beginning of the round to be worked need help with a tubular cast on and bind off check out the links at the end of the pattern construction this pattern is knit seamless in the round from the bottom up a tubular cast on and bind off is used to give a finished look sizes available in 4 different sizes child adult small adult medium adult materials large meant to be worn with 1 negative 20 g color a -
